mapper.select: select a.APPLY_ID, te.TE_NAME apply_name, a.APPLY_DATE, a.EX_NOTES apply_reason, c.TC_NAME class_name, tem.te_name take_name, a.TAKE_DATE take_date, a.RESON, decode(a.A_STATE,'0','未审批', '1','同意','2','不同意') apply_state, a.status from t_apply a left join t_classes c on a.class_id=c.tc_id left join t_employee te on a.APPLY_EMP_NO=te.TE_ID left join t_employee tem on a.TAKE_EMP_NO=tem.te_id
